Have you tried linking the image directly, as opposed to the imgur page?

May I offer a suggestion as someone who uses and creates a lot of images?

It appears the problem is not with the forum but in how the photo was manipulated while being uploaded. Allow IMGUR to upload the image full size, then edit it to fit the size you want. Do not uncheck the option that turns off the automatic proportional scaling; choose either the first or second box (first is length and the second is height) and enter a number - and allow IMGUR to do the rest. Click on "APPLY" and then "SAVE" at which point, you should be taken back to your new image with all the links.

If this doesn't work, there are more in-depth ways this can be accomplished... I'll be glad to help.

not sure sometime you need to readd the extension/format manually also: *.jpg *.png etc ... (here png it seem)
